name: eltpsi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: -| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c2)))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)
⊣ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)
⊣ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈ TopSp)

body.origin:
|- wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
body.pretty:
⊢ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ (c2 ∈ Top ↔ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wb(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ (c2 ∈ Top ↔ c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c2, ctop), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c2)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c2 > }

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(c0, ctps)
-| wcel(c2, ctop)
-| wceq(c1, cuni(c2))
-| wceq(c0, cpr(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), c1), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), c2)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ TopSp
⊣ c2 ∈ Top
⊣ c1 = ⋃ c2
⊣ c0 = { <(Base ` ndx), c1 >, <(TopSet ` ndx), c2 > }

comment: Properties that determine a topological space from a construction (using no explicit indices). (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2015.)
